Name: Space Road
About the game: Forward! Forward! Important point! ➡ More than 20 levels! ➡Niveaux very special bonus! ➡ Gamepad compatible! ➡Addictive ! On the way to a new Galaxy! In Space Road get on board your spaceship and get all the stars! A number of stars is required to unlock each level. To do this, you will surf the walls of the space path while avoiding all the obstacles on your way while recovering the balls of precious energy to get the stars! You will unlock bonus levels that will change the way you play and test your adaptability and reflexes in the space environment. You will find on your way entities that can: - Protect yourself from all obstacles for a few seconds - Slow down time and allow yourself to avoid obstacles with ease. But be careful! Space can play bad tricks on you [...] Who will get the most stars?
